name: Unipix
description:
**PLEASE RUN IN FULLSCREEN** Play as Unipix, a robot created to test the latest innovation from Science Laboratory™, The Doodad™.

Use this device to manipulate your environment to clear the 6 test chambers set up by your creators, to win your way into robot heaven.

Team
  • Santripta Sharma - Programming, Game Design, Level "Design"
  • SaltyPakoda - Art
  • Flayr- Music/Sound Effects
